org.alljoyn.bus.ifaces
Interface DBusProxyObj

@BusInterface(name="org.freedesktop.DBus")
public interface DBusProxyObj

The standard org.freedesktop.DBus interface that is implemented by the local AllJoyn daemon. It is used to control bus operations such as obtaining well-known names and establishing routing rules.

The functionality of DBusProxyObj is limited to functions that are available in the DBus protocols. To use advanced AllJoyn features such as Peer-to-peer connections, use AllJoynProxyObj.

Field Detail

REQUEST_NAME_NO_FLAGS

static final int REQUEST_NAME_NO_FLAGS
If there is no owner of this name then take ownership. Otherwise this request is queued until the current owner releases this name.

See Also:
Constant Field Values

REQUEST_NAME_ALLOW_REPLACEMENT

static final int REQUEST_NAME_ALLOW_REPLACEMENT
Allow other bus connections to "take" this name away from this BusAttachment.

See Also:
Constant Field Values

REQUEST_NAME_REPLACE_EXISTING

static final int REQUEST_NAME_REPLACE_EXISTING
Attempt to take the name away from another bus connection if it is already owned.

See Also:
Constant Field Values

REQUEST_NAME_DO_NOT_QUEUE

static final int REQUEST_NAME_DO_NOT_QUEUE
If the name is already taken, don't wait in a queue for the name to become available.

See Also:
Constant Field Values

NameHasOwner

@BusMethod(signature="s",
           replySignature="b")
boolean NameHasOwner(String name)
                     throws BusException
Returns true if name has an owner on the bus.

Parameters:
name - name to check for ownership
Returns:
true iff the well-known name is currently registered with the bus
Throws:
BusException

StartServiceByName

@BusMethod(signature="su",
           replySignature="u")
DBusProxyObj.StartServiceByNameResult StartServiceByName(String name,
                                                                                          int flags)
                                                         throws BusException
Starts the local daemon process responsible for a given well-known name. Names for services that can be started in this manner are returned by ListActivatableNames().

Parameters:
name - well-known name whose service process will be started
flags - not used
Returns:
disposition of start service by name operation
Throws:
BusException

GetNameOwner

@BusMethod(signature="s",
           replySignature="s")
String GetNameOwner(String name)
                    throws BusException
Gets the unique id of the bus connection that owns a given well-known name.

Parameters:
name - well-known name.
Returns:
unique id that owns well-known name
Throws:
BusException - if the well-known name is not owned

GetConnectionUnixUser

@BusMethod(signature="s",
           replySignature="u")
int GetConnectionUnixUser(String name)
                          throws BusException
Gets the uid of the process connected to the local AllJoyn daemon identified by the well-known or unique name.

Parameters:
name - well-known or unique name whose connection will be examined
Returns:
uid of process connected to local AllJoyn daemon with given name
Throws:
BusException - if the uid cannot be determined

AddMatch

@BusMethod(signature="s")
void AddMatch(String rule)
              throws BusException
Adds a DBus routing rule. See the DBus spec for details and format of DBus routing rules.

Parameters:
rule - match rule to add
Throws:
BusException

NameOwnerChanged

@BusSignal(signature="sss")
void NameOwnerChanged(String name,
                                         String oldOwner,
                                         String newOwner)
                      throws BusException
Signal broadcast whenever a name (well-known or unique) changes ownership.

Parameters:
name - well-known or unique name that has changed owner
oldOwner - unique name of previous owner or empty string if no previous owner
newOwner - unique name of new name owner or empty string if no new owner
Throws:
BusException

@BusSignal(signature="s")
void NameLost(String name)
              throws BusException

Parameters:
name - name that was lost
Throws:
BusException
